name: Wave
headline: Mobile money app for Africa
description: Building extremely affordable financial infrastructure for Africa.
generated_description:
**Wave: Revolutionizing Mobile Money in Africa**

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W12, Wave is shaking up the financial landscape in Africa with its innovative mobile money app. Headquartered in Dakar, Senegal, and boasting a team of 1,600 dedicated employees, Wave’s mission is clear: to provide an affordable and accessible financial infrastructure for African users.

At its core, Wave is all about simplicity and cost-effectiveness. The app allows users to deposit, withdraw, and pay bills for free, with the added benefit of sending money to anyone for just 1%. Whether you’re looking to buy airtime, protect your funds with top-notch security, or access instant customer support via their toll-free line, Wave has you covered.

What’s particularly commendable is Wave’s commitment to addressing the unique financial challenges faced by Africans. With a user-friendly approach, they’re tackling the barriers that many people encounter when trying to manage their money. This isn't just fintech; it’s fintech with heart.

The company is currently hiring, which speaks to its rapid growth and ambition. If you're interested in joining a dynamic team that's genuinely making a difference, check out their open positions [here](https://wave.com/en/careers/).

In a nutshell, Wave is not just a mobile money app; it’s a game changer for financial services in Africa. With their intuitive platform and low-cost transactions, they are setting a new standard for what mobile money can achieve. For more information, visit their website at [wave.com](https://wave.com).
